Pre-Game Insights: The Pittsburgh Pirates and the Cincinnati Reds meet Sunday in MLB action from Great American Ball Park.
This will be the final installment in a three-game series.
Hunter Greene will start for the Reds. This year Greene is 9-4 with a 2.83 ERA in 24 starts.
Paul Skenes will start for the Pirates. So far Skenes is 10-3 with a 2.07 ERA in the first 21 starts of his career.
The Pirates lost the first three games against the St. Louis Cardinals before a 3-2 win Thursday.
The Reds played the Atlanta Braves in their last set, winning 6-5 in the first game before a pair of losses to drop the series.
